message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
That's a very generous offer Alice, but how about we split it a bit more evenly this time? My turn to be generous.
Okay, let's try this. I'll take 60%, and you can have 40%.  We're getting closer to a fair split!
I appreciate you meeting me closer to the middle, Alice. How about we settle this now with a bit more for me?
Let's call it even. I'll take 55% and you can have 45%. This is the fairest split we can get before the inflation gets too high.
